doc:
Patrick McGaw https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Patrick_McGaw 0 Patrick McGaw (born September 13, 1967) is an American actor. He is best known for his role as Neutron in the 1995 film The Basketball Diaries and as Doug Gordon in the 1996 film Malicious. McGaw also appeared in the films Amongst Friends (1993) (his first acting credit), Scorpion Spring (1996) and Dream with the Fishes (1997). From 1997–1998, McGaw was a regular cast member on the Steven Bochco-produced police drama, Brooklyn South, playing Terry Doyle. He then guest starred in the series Chicken Soup for the Soul in 2000 and CSI: Crime Scene Investigation in 2008, which is his last acting credit to date. Patrick_McGaw ( born September_13_,_1967 ) is an_American_actor . He is_best_known for his_role as Neutron in the_1995_film The_Basketball_Diaries and as Doug_Gordon in the_1996_film_Malicious . McGaw also appeared in the_films Amongst Friends ( 1993 ) ( his_first_acting_credit_) , Scorpion_Spring_(_1996_)_and_Dream with the_Fishes_(_1997_) . From 1997 – 1998 , McGaw was a_regular_cast_member on the_Steven_Bochco-produced_police_drama , Brooklyn_South , playing Terry_Doyle . He then guest starred in the_series_Chicken_Soup for the_Soul in 2000 and CSI : Crime_Scene_Investigation in 2008 , which is his_last_acting_credit to date .
